item.description:
The 4th annual oceanfront music and dancing extravaganza at the world famous Red Parrot on Nantasket Beach in Hull, MA. $15 cover goes to benefit Muscular Dystrophy. The entertainment will be the classic rock band, 'Desperate Measures' performing from 7pm till 11pm.

Come to meet, socialize, and dance. Come early and enjoy food on the Red Parrot's outdoor deck overlooking Nantasket 'http://www.theredparrot.com/'. Plan on a guaranteed fun evening!
item.name: Red Parrot Restaurant/ Dance in Hull
